alert.note: Alert for Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 6:26PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Tehama and south central Shasta Counties through 715 PM PDT... At 623 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm just north of Red Bluff and south of Cottonwood along Interstate 5, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Red Bluff, Blossom, Dairyville and Cottonwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley
